briefdescription.para: Take a reference on a LinphoneRecorder object.

parameterdescription.para: The path to the file to open.

briefdescription.para: Gets the file used for recording.

simplesect.para: the file used for the recording if any.

briefdescription.para: Start the recording into the opened file.
Gets the current state of the recorder.
Gets the duration of the recording.

simplesect.para: the duration of the recording, in milliseconds.

briefdescription.para: Get linear volume when capturing audio.
Create a content from the recording, for example to send it in a chat message.

simplesect.para: Recorder must be in Closed state!
the LinphoneContent matching the recording, or NULL.

briefdescription.para: Take a reference on a LinphoneRecorderParams object.
